content: May 8 (OPTA) - Primeira Liga fixtures for this week Monday, May 8 fixtures (WET/GMT) Famalicão v Chaves (1900/1800) Arouca v Porto (2115/2015) Friday, May 12 fixtures (WET/GMT) Gil Vicente v Boavista (2015/1915) Saturday, May 13 fixtures (WET/GMT) Chaves v Paços de Ferreira (1530/1430) Vizela v Famalicão (1530/1430) Portimonense v Benfica (1800/1700) Sporting CP v Marítimo (2030/1930) Sunday, May 14 fixtures (WET/GMT) Rio Ave v Vitória Guimarães (1530/1430) Sporting Braga v Santa Clara (1800/1700) Porto v Casa Pia (2030/1930) Monday, May 15 fixtures (WET/GMT) Estoril v Arouca (2015/1915)
